texto1: < BOT FUNCTIONS />
▢ *Option:* ✨
▢ *Command:*
▢ *Description:* Activates or deactivates welcome messages in the group.
texto2: ▢ *Description:* The bot becomes public and/or private.
▢ *Note:* This command can only be used by the bot owner(s).
texto3: ▢ *Option:* 🥵
▢ *Command:*
▢ *Description:* Activates or deactivates NSFW commands in the group.
texto4: ▢ *Option:* 🔗
▢ *Command:*
▢ *Description:* Activates or deactivates WhatsApp link anti-spam.
▢ *Note:* Restricted function must be enabled.
texto5: ▢ *Description:* Activates or deactivates HTTPS link anti-spam.
texto6: ▢ *Description:* Activates or deactivates group change notifications.
texto7: ▢ *Description:* Detects group modifications and provides better management.
texto8: ▢ *Description:* Activates or deactivates Bot restrictions, such as removing or adding people to a group.
▢ *Note:* This command can only be used by the bot owner(s).
texto9: ▢ *Description:* Automatically marks messages and statuses as read.
▢ *Note:* This command can only be used by the bot owner(s).
texto10: ▢ *Description:* Activates or deactivates prefixless audio commands in the group.
texto11: ▢ *Description:* All images or videos sent in the group are converted to stickers.
texto12: ▢ *Description:* The Bot will only respond to commands if it's a private chat.
▢ *Note:* This command can only be used by the bot owner(s).
texto13: ▢ *Description:* The Bot will only respond to commands if it's a group.
▢ *Note:* This command can only be used by the bot owner(s).
texto14: ▢ *Description:* Images sent for one-time viewing are forwarded normally by the Bot.
texto15: ▢ *Description:* The Bot will block people who call the Bot.
▢ *Note:* This command can only be used by the Bot owners.
texto16: ▢ *Description:* Detects swear words and warns the group participant before being removed.
texto17: ▢ *Description:* The Bot detects long texts that could be viruses and cause chat lag and eliminates the user.
texto18: ▢ *Description:* If an Arabic number joins the group, the Bot removes it automatically.
▢ *Note:* Welcome and restricted functions must be enabled.
texto19: ▢ *Description:* If an Arabic number writes in the group, the Bot removes it automatically.
texto20: ▢ *Description:* The bot will only respond to messages sent by the group admins.
texto21: ▢ *Description:* The bot will start responding to messages using SimSimi AI.
texto22: ▢ *Description:* The bot detects when a user deletes a message and resends it.
texto23: ▢ *Description:* Bot's audio commands from the audio menu are disabled for all private chats.
▢ *Note:* This command can only be used by the bot owner(s).
texto24: ▢ *Description:* 'Artificial Intelligence' mode with ChatGPT is activated in all private chats.
▢ *Note:* This command can only be used by the bot owner(s).
texto25: ▢ *Description:* The Bot detects when a user spams commands and bans them for 5 seconds and warns them.
▢ *Note:* This command can only be used by the bot owner(s).
texto26: ▢ *Description:* Activates or deactivates the command usage for sub-bots.
▢ *Note:* This command can only be used by the bot owner(s).
texto27: ▢ *Description:* The Bot will block people who write in the Bot's private chat.
▢ *Note:* This command can only be used by the bot owner(s).

texto3: You are the light that brightens my life in the darkness.
With you, every day is a new adventure full of love.
Your eyes are the reflection of the sky where I want to lose myself.
Every beat of my heart carries your name.
In your arms, I found the home I always sought.
You are the dream I never want to wake up from.
True love is being together in good and bad times.
There are no distances when two hearts are united.
Your kisses are the melody that accelerates my heart.
To love is to see in you what no one else can see.
In every beat, I carry you with me wherever I go.
The love I feel for you is my strength and inspiration.
Your sweet words are my daily emotional nourishment.
You are the most precious gift life has given me.
Time stands still when I'm by your side.
In your laughter, I find the happiness I was looking for.
Every day by your side is a never-ending love story.
Our love is like a fairy tale that has come true.
Your hugs are my refuge in this chaotic world.
You are the reason I believe in destiny.
To love is to discover something new to admire in you every day.
Your love is the blank canvas where I paint my happiness.
With you, the future is a path full of promises and dreams.
You are the lighthouse that guides my heart in the darkness.
The magic of love is in every gesture we share.
In your arms, the whole world disappears and only you and I exist.
Love is the language in which our hearts converse.
You are the piece that was missing to complete my soul.
To love is to find in you everything I never knew I needed.
texto4: Accept that changes are a natural part of life and learn to adapt to them.
Never stop learning; knowledge is a powerful tool.
Take care of your physical and mental health, they are fundamental for a fulfilling life.
Enjoy the little things, for they are what give meaning to life.
Learn to forgive, both others and yourself, to free your heart.
Value the time you spend with your loved ones, it is the most valuable gift you can give and receive.
Be kind and compassionate to others, every act of kindness can make a difference in their lives.
Learn to say 'no' when necessary and establish healthy boundaries.
Find time to do what you love, as it nourishes your soul and makes you feel alive.
Do not compare yourself to others, each person has their own path and pace in life.
Listen to your partner with empathy and understanding, communication is the foundation of a solid relationship.
Do not be afraid to express your feelings, honesty is essential in love.
Learn to compromise and sacrifice, love requires mutual sacrifice and effort.
Surprise your partner from time to time, keep the flame of romance alive.
Respect your partner's individuality and allow them to grow as a person.
Self-love is as important as loving someone else; take care of yourself and value yourself.
Remember that a healthy relationship is based on mutual trust and respect.
Choose someone who complements you and makes you a better version of yourself.
True love does not make you feel smaller, it makes you feel bigger.
Love is a verb, it is a daily choice that is cultivated with actions and words.
Find a job that you are passionate about and you will never feel like you are working.
Be proactive and take initiative in your work, it will be appreciated by your superiors.
Learn from your mistakes and failures, they are opportunities to grow and improve.
Maintain a positive attitude and seek solutions to challenges at work.
Cultivate good relationships with your colleagues, teamwork is essential for success.
Set clear and realistic goals and work with determination to achieve them.
Do not be afraid to ask for help or seek guidance, there is always something new to learn.
Recognize and value your achievements, celebrate your successes, no matter how small.
Strive for a balance between your professional and personal life, both aspects are important.
Work is an important part of your life, but it is not everything that defines who you are.
Believe in yourself and in your ability to achieve what you set out to do.
Visualize your goals and dreams, imagine how you will feel when you achieve them.
Find inspiration in those who have overcome similar obstacles to yours.
Accept failures as part of the process, they are opportunities to learn and grow.
Surround yourself with positive people who push you forward.
Maintain an open mind and be willing to learn new things.
Remember why you started when you feel demotivated; reconnect with your purpose.
Break down your goals into small steps, this will make the path more achievable and less overwhelming.
Do not be afraid to pursue your dreams, life is too short to live with regrets.
Trust that, with effort and perseverance, you can achieve everything you set out to do.

texto1: I would like to be paper so I could wrap that candy.
You're like wifi without a password, everyone looks for you.
I wish I were a bus to travel the curves of your heart.
I want to fly without wings and leave this universe, enter yours, and love you in silence.
I wish I were butter to melt on your arepa.
If beauty were a sin, you'd already be in hell.
I wish I were a cat to spend 7 lives by your side.
Stealing is wrong, but I would steal a kiss from your lips.
As beautiful as the sky is when it's clear, but more beautiful is love when I have you by my side.
Pretty, walk in the shade, the sun melts chocolates.
If I were an email, you would be my password.
I wish you were a mountain so I could give you ax strokes.
I lost my phone number. Can I have yours?
What's your name so I can ask for you as a gift from Santa Claus?
In the sky, there are many stars, but the brightest one is on Earth and it's you.
Did the sun just come out or is it the smile you gave me today?
It's not the rum or the beer, it's you who got to my head.
If we talk about math, you are the sum of all my desires.
You look like Google because you have everything I'm looking for.
My favorite coffee is the one in your eyes.
I want to be Photoshop to retouch your whole body.
I wish you were cereal, so I could harvest you every morning.
I wish I were hunger, so I could have you three times a day.

texto2: Sometimes, friendship is the beginning of something beautiful, but it doesn't always turn into love.
Love isn't everything, friendship is also great! Cherish your special friendship.
Remember that the best relationships start with a good friendship. Don't underestimate your bond!
Sometimes, love can grow over time. Keep strengthening your connection!
Life is a surprise, who knows what the future holds! Don't lose hope.
Although love may not blossom as you hoped, your connection is still valuable.
Hearts may take time to synchronize, but that doesn't diminish how special you are together.
Despite the challenges of love, your friendship is a gift that deserves to be celebrated.
Time may reveal surprising things. Let's keep exploring together!
Life is full of unexpected twists. Stay open to possibilities!
